dmca.title: Alleged Copying of Article About Flight 93
dmca.body:
HUGHES, LUCE LLP
ATTORNEYS AND COUNSELORS				

[private]
Dallas, Texas 75201
[private]
[private] (fax)

hughesluce.com

[private]
[private]
[private]

March 20, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
Fax: [private]

Dear Sir or Madam:

	I am an attorney with the law firm of Hughes & Luce, and I am writing on my own behalf to report three copyright violations that are currently indexed on Google when a search is done for my name.

     Section 1 - Copyrighted Material. There are two pieces of material that are copyrighted by me- First, an article of mine appears at http://www.enterstageright.com/archive/articles/1001/1001flight93.htm. Second, some blog postings of mine appeared at http://stuartbuck.blogspot.com. (I have since deleted the posts in question, but you can find them at the Web Archive at http://web.archive.org/web/20020118120252/http://stuartbuck.blogspot.com/).

     Section 2 - Infringing Websites --

     Search Query: "Stuart Buck"
	
     First Infringing Webpage (fourth result on the search page): http://www.fpp.co.uk/online/01/10/UA93/Buck231001.html
	
     Second Infringing Webpage (twelfth result on the search page): http://www.fpp.co.uk/online/01/10/UA93/BuckComments231001.html

     Search Query: "Stuart buck" gallagher

     Third Infringing Webpage (fifth result from the search):
http://www.babelmagazine.com/issue34/whatreallyhappenedtoflight93.html

(Note that many other possible searches will reach these pages as well.)
	
The article featured on the first and third infringing webpages is the exact same article that I originally published at http://www.enterstageright.com/archive/articles/1001/1001flight93.htm. I never gave permission for the article to be used anywhere else.

Hughes & Luce LLP
Attorneys and Counselors

Google DMCA Copyright
March 20, 2003
Page 2


	The weblog postings that appear on the Second Infringing Webpage are also by me. I never gave permission for anyone to reprint them anywhere else.

     Section 3 - My Contact Information

     I can be reached at [private], or [private] (phone) or [private] (fax).

     Section 4 - Contact Information for the Infringing Webpages
     The email address of the infringer for the First and Second infringing pages is [private], and his name is [private]. (He is a well-known Holocaust denier who lives in England, which is anothet reason that I am publicly embarrassed to have him reprinting my works without permission. It might give people who search for my name the false impression that I am somehow associated with [private].)

     The email address for the infringer of the Third infringing page is [private].

     Section 5 -- Attestations

     As required, I swear and attest as follows by my signature below:
     I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner [me], its agent, or the law.

     I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

     I appreciate your help in preventing these gross copyright violations.

Best regards,


[private]
